fields.Chapter Title: <span><span style="font-size:11pt;background-color:transparent;">“​​Using Lateral Reading to Fact-Check AI-Generated Content”</span></span>
fields.Book Title: The AI and Library Instruction Cookbook
fields.Publisher: Association of College and Research Libraries
fields.Description/Abstract: <p><span style="font-weight:400;">Through the lesson (recipe) in this chapter, students will 1) learn the importance of evaluating the authority and credibility of AI-generated responses, and 2) use lateral reading techniques to fact-check AI content for inaccurate or misleading information. More broadly, this chapter focuses on durable skills for evaluating accuracy and bias in information resources and connects to the ACRL frames “Authority is Constructed and Contextual” and “Information Has Value.” </span></p>
